Network Management

Our platform is built to collaborate and give healthcare networks a powerful way use patient experience data to enhance patient outcomes throughout the continuum of care.

Get Started

Who We Serve

Hospitals

ACOs

Payors

Network Management

Customize and form provider groups that deliver a unified approach to patient experience, delivering consistent quality.

Patient Journeys

Visualize and analyze a patient's experience through an entire episode and through the whole continuum. Share key patient information to optimize partner transitions and to keep every care team on the same page.

Social Determinants of Health

Collect and understand the key conditions and data sets that drive SDOH. Understand the root causes that impact population health and create an informed data set.

Automated Updates

Automate notifications and alerts to key stakeholders for proactive visibility into a patient's progress, in your facility or at a partner's.

Data Collaboration

Create data transparency through shared reports and dashboards and grow not only as an individual contributor but together as a network.

Ready to deliver the best patient experience?

Contact us to learn more about how Kubo Health can help you provide the very best care to your patients.
